00019 {
00020   // 
00021   // Computes the number of leading 0s or 1s (selected by bit_val) in a
00022   // given byte.  For example, the number of leading 0s in 00010110 is
00023   // 3,
00024   // and the number of leading 1s is 0.
00025   // 
00026 
00027   int retval = 0;
00028 
00029   for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00030     int bit_i = (n >> (7 - i)) & 1;
00031     if (bit_i == bit_val) {
00032       retval++;
00033     } else {
00034       break;
00035     }
00036   }
00037
